author: COMSOL
description: A planar dielectric slab waveguide demonstrates the principles behind any kind of dielectric waveguide, for example ridge waveguides and step index fibers. This example solves for the electric and magnetic fields of a dielectric slab waveguide. The effective index is then computed and compared to the corresponding analytic result.
label: dielectric_slab_waveguide.mph
